moves.name: Octazooka
moves.effect: Has a good chance of lowering the target’s accuracy.

moves.name: X Sp. Def
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s Sp. Def.

moves.name: Scald
moves.effect: Removes the frozen condition from the user. Has a moderate chance of leaving the target burned.

moves.name: Only the Best!
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s Defense and Sp. Atk.

syncMove.name: Gourmet Octazooka
syncMove.description: Its power increases if the target is burned.

passives.name: Hostile Environment 1
passives.description: Raises the chance of inflicting status conditions with the additional effects of moves.

passives.name: Fortuitous 4
passives.description: Has a good chance of raising the user’s Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, Speed, accuracy, or evasiveness at random when an attack is successful.
